body.p: If the direct method of consolidation is used, the fall in the value of Parent’s net investment in Subsidiary C of €24 million would be reflected totally in the foreign currency translation reserve relating to Subsidiary C in Parent’s consolidated financial statements. However, because Parent uses the step‑by‑step method, this fall in the net investment value in Subsidiary C of €24 million would be reflected both in Subsidiary B’s foreign currency translation reserve relating to Subsidiary C and in Parent’s foreign currency translation reserve relating to Subsidiary B.
